column1: Kata Robata////2. Tofu and eggplant with truffle oil sauce- the tofu was expertly prepared
column2: and the seasoning on this and the eggplant was so good I wish I could have this one weekly. I'm sorry I'm not better at recalling the nature of the seasoning
column3: but it was soy saucey and gingery and spicy. Mmm.
